long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just a Scroll to Top Button

Click the button and scroll the current page back to top. 

Everyday scrolling on long pages can be a tiring experience specially on those sites which provides infinite scrolling. Just click on arrow up and go to top page site.
